pkgmetadata.longdescription: Model based Random Forest analysis // This package implements random forest method for model based recursive partitioning. The mob() function, developed by Zeileis et al (2008), within party package, is modified to construct model-based decision trees based on random forests methodology. The main input function mobForestAnalysis() takes all input parameters to construct trees, compute out-of-bag errors, predictions, and overall accuracy of forest. The algorithm performs parallel computation using clusterApply() function within 'parallel' package.
